messages.messageBody:
hi!i´ve been trying to get my hands onthe book called NITEN-KI.no
luck.can anyone help me out here?i need to read it(in english)(its a
book about Shinmen Musashi ,written by his "followers")ill be ever
gratefull!!...regards JORE,from Finland

__
